text: Sheikh Nawaf Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah ( Nawaf al-Ahmad al-Jābir as-Sabāh, 25 June 1937 – 16 December 2023) was the Emir of Kuwait following the death of Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber on 29 September 2020. He was the Deputy Commander of the Military of Kuwait. He was the half-brother of the Emir of Kuwait, Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah. Nawaf was nominated as Crown Prince on 7 February 2006 against the tradition of the Al-Sabah family.Nawaf is appointed Kuwait Crown Prince Gulf News, 8 February 2006 ==Heath== On 29 November 2023, Nawaf was admitted to a hospital following an emergency health issue. ==Death== He died on 16 December 2023 in Hawalli Governorate, Kuwait at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Emirs of Kuwait
title: Nawaf Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah
